/hr/oci--ghcr.io-kyverno-charts-kyverno.title: kyverno helm release
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-kyverno-charts-kyverno.name: kyverno
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-kyverno-charts-kyverno.doc:
Kyverno is a policy engine for Kubernetes that enables you to define and enforce policies for your cluster resources. It provides a flexible and scalable solution for managing your cluster configuration, allowing you to enforce best practices, prevent misconfigurations, and enforce compliance requirements.

The kyverno/policies offer all kinds of security and best practice policies that you could use.

0:
auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes

---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test

routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

bootstrapDns: tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
upstream:
  default:
  #- tcp+udp:2001:67c:1be8::53:1
  #- tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
  - tcp-tls:one.one.one.one
  - tcp-tls:dns.google
conditional:
  mapping:
    lan.${HOME_DOMAIN}: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
    skylab.fi: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
    fh: tcp+udp:fd0d:944c:1337:a::1
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ookangzheng/dbl-oisd-nl/master/dbl.txt
    windowsSpy:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy.txt
  whiteLists:
    ads:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt
    own:
    - https://gist.githubusercontent.com/samip5/447f880e84601b7c44a659faf1c60669/raw/62170401cd2a43533895266a2e7fcafe24a69362/whitelist.txt
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
    - ads
    - windowsSpy
clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
caching:
  minTime: 1m
  maxTime: 30m
  prefetching: true
  prefetchExpires: 2h
  prefetchThreshold: 5
  prefetchMaxItemsCount: 0
redis:
  address: redis.databases.svc.cluster.local
  database: 10
  required: false
  connectionAttempts: 10
  connectionCooldown: 30s
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
queryLog:
  type: postgresql
  target: "host=192.168.2.2 user=blocky password=${SECRET_BLOCKY_DB_PASSWORD} dbname=blocky sslmode=disable TimeZone=Europe/Helsinki"
  logRetentionDays: 14
httpPort: 4000
